title: FS: Former raw lot of 10 now graded; mostly 40s
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: Former raw lot of 10 now graded; mostly 40s
posts.post_content:
I attempted to sell these raw, but ended up submitting to SGC.  Cards shipped to me today, so I have the grades.  Accepting offers, see the raw card scans below:

Bradley (Bat) - SC350-25 - SGC40
Davidson - P350 (oversized) - SGC40
Doolan (Batting) - P460 - SGC45
Donohue - P150 - SGC40
Dubuc - SC350-30 - SGC45
Herzog (NY) - P150 - SGC50
Reagan - OM - SGC40
Rossman - P350 (appears short) - too small to holder
Street - P350 - SGC40
Carr - S350 - SGC40
I'll take the AB lot if nobody has claimed it.
cards on their way back from SGC; make an offer!
